"Nordiran Meat":
"<%me>, I owe you a huge apology!
You know that Deeg meat you got for me? Well, after
I stewed it for hours, I discovered my friend's birthday
wasn't the day I thought it was! What a complete
waste of time! Well, not completely. At least the
Deeg stew was incredibly delicious. Anyway, this
time I want to try my hand at a more advanced
dragorii stew, so I'll be needing some Nordiran meat
for that. I just have to have some Nordiran meat!
*Target: Nordirans level 24 or higher"

"<%me>さん、ごめんなさい！　
せっかくあなたに獲ってもらったディッグを
じっくり煮込んだのに、私ったら
友達の誕生日を間違えてたの。もう最悪……
でもね、本当においしかったわ！
それで今度はワンランク上の龍肉の煮物に
挑戦したいの。ノーディランのお肉でね！
だからお願い！　もう一度無理を聞いて！
どうしてもノーディランのお肉がほしいの！
※Lv.24～のノーディランが対象"
